title: APP PROBLEM FIX!!
text: For anyone having the issue I have had for the past 24 hours, being that the app would connect but not allow using any features. I called the support system and apparently you have to reset the ROLL after every update. To do this, disconnect the roll from the phone and hold the roll's power button+volume minus for 10 seconds. This should result in the power shutting off. Upon power on the Bluetooth button will flash to indicate a fresh reboot and requirement to reconnect a device. After reconnection, the app should work like before. I hope this helps everyone reading this for this issue.

title: UE Roll speaker is great, app is not

The app can remotely see the battery life when the speaker is off, and it can remotely power ON the speaker - but once the speaker is on, the app thinks it's no longer connected. Mind you, the phone still plays fine to the speaker, I can control the volume with my iPhone volume buttons as well as my watch "now playing" app ‚Äì but I can't use any other features of the App like equalizer, double up, and presumably future firmware updates.

I've tried uninstalling/reinstalling the app as well as repairing the Bluetooth speaker ‚Äî problem is unchanged. 

I called Logitech customer support three times and each time got mysteriously disconnected... Yay. 

So... Super happy with the speaker, but the app and customer service is frustrating beyond reason. Hope an update to the app fixes this.
